alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 9:21PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick, south central Columbus and east central Horry Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 921 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Iredell, or near Little River, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Island, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Ocean Crest Pier, Little River, Iredell, St. James, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Civie Town, Grissettown, Supply, Longwood, Seaside, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, Russtown, Pireway and Long Beach. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
